co.nayt.picnic

Class Picnic

  • java.lang.Object
    • co.nayt.picnic.Picnic

  • public class Picnic
extends java.lang.Object
    This class creates pools of background threads for downloading images from the web using supplied URL strings. The class is implemented as a singleton; the only way to get a Picnic instance is to call getInstance().

    The class sets an LruCache image cache of 4MB and creates a fixed-size thread pool of 8 threads.

    Finally, this class defines a handler that communicates back to the UI thread to change the bitmap to reflect the state.

        Starts an image download and decode. Both target width and height must be supplied.
        Parameters:
        imageView - The ImageView that will get the resulting Bitmap
        targetWidth - The target width of the resulting Bitmap
        targetHeight - The target height of the resulting Bitmap
        Returns:
